Description: Condition: This Jackson Monarkh SC is in excellent condition, with little signs of wear. There are some slight pick scratches, but no major dings or chips.  The Pro Series Monarkh SC features a mahogany body with an arched maple top, along with a 1-piece maple neck with graphite reinforcement.  It has a comfortable speed neck backshape with a 12" to 16" compound radius, and is stacked with Seymour Duncan Blackouts. Features & Technical Specs: Body Wood: Mahogany with Arched Maple Top Body Color/Finish: Gloss Black Neck Wood: 1-Piece Maple with Graphite Reinforcement and Scarf Joint Neck Profile: Speed Neck Backshape Neck Radius: 12" to 16" Compound Radius (304.8 mm to 406.4 mm) Neck Joint: Set neck Fingerboard: Ebony Fingerboard Inlays: Reduced size outline Pearloid Sharkfins Frets: 22 Jumbo Nut: Black Plastic Nut Width: 1.625" (41.3mm) Tuners: Jackson® Die-Cast Locking Scale Length: 24.75" (628 mm) Bridge: Jackson® Compensated and Adjustable Strings-Through-Body Pickups: Seymour Duncan® Blackouts AHB-1 Controls: Volume 1. Neck Pickup, Volume 2. Bridge Pickup, Master Volume Hardware Finish: Black Case: Not Included Serial Number: ICJ1605977 Weight: 8.09 lbs. Switching: 3 Position Toggle: P1 - Bridge pickup P2 - Bridge and neck pickup P3 - Neck pickup
Title: Jackson Pro Series Monarkh SC - Gloss Black - Premium Preowned
